#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
#define debug false
using namespace std;

int leftr(int n) {
	int t1=n%10;
	n/=10;
	int t3=n;
	int t2=0;
	while(t3>0) {
		t2++;
		t3/=10;
	}
	n = t1*pow(10, t2) + n;
	return n;
}

int rightr(int n) {
	int t3=n;
	int t2=1;
	while(t3>0) {
		t2*=10;
		t3/=10;
	}
	t2/=10;
	int t1=n/t2;
	n %= t2;
	n*=10;
	n+=t1;
	return n;
}

int main() {
	int t, n, i, l, max, t1, t4;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t>0) {
		cin>>s;
		l=s.length();
		n = atoi(s.c_str());
		if(n==0) {
			max=0;
			goto print;
		}
		max=leftr(rightr(n));
		t1=rightr(leftr(n));
		if(t1>max)
			max=t1;
		t4=n;
		for(i=0;i<=l;i++) {
			n=leftr(n);
			if(n>max)
				max=n;
			if(debug)
				cout<<n<<"\n";
		}
		n=t4;
		for(i=0;i<=l;i++) {
			n=rightr(n);
			if(n>max)
				max=n;
			if(debug)
				cout<<n<<"\n";
		}
		print:
		cout<<max<<"\n";
		t--;
	}
	return 0;
}
